item.title: About Me
item.description: Hi, I am Ridwan Fadjar. I am a passionate IT Engineer who took specialization in software (backend) and cloud infrastructure engineering. I have hands-on experience for 9+ years. Currently, I am living in Indonesia. I have interests in DevOps, cloud infrastructure development, high scalable systems, serverless computing, container orchestration, IT governance, IT security and many more. Currently, I am working as Cloud Infrastructure Engineer at DKatalis Digital Lab which building end-to-end financial system in Indonesia.

item.title: Achievements
item.description: I have completed some training or courses. Here they are. Training or Courses 2023 Udemy - GitLab CI - A Complete Hands-On for CI/CD Pipelines & DevOps by A to Z Mentors Udemy - Istio Hands-On for Kubernetes by Richard Chesterwood Udemy - Kubernetes Certified Application Developer (CKAD) with Tests by Mumshad Mannambeth 2022 Udemy - Certified Kubernetes Administrator (CKA) with Practice Tests by Mumshad Mannambeth Udemy - Jenkins, From Zero To Hero: Become a DevOps Jenkins Master by Ricardo Andre Gonzalez Gomez Google Cloud Skill Boost Badges Microsoft Learn Skill Badges Coursera - Site Reliability Engineering: Measuring and Managing Reliability by Google Cloud Coursera - Architecting with Google Kubernetes Engine Specialization by Google Cloud 2021

item.title: Certification
item.description: Currently, I am certified as: Google Cloud Platform - Associate Cloud Engineer Google Cloud Platform - Cloud Digital Leader

item.title: My Projects
item.description: I open some my personal projects in Github. You may access those projects here. 2023: terraform-airflow-config - Terraform module for managing Apache Airflow Variables, Pools and Connections -> click here terraform-airflow-user - Terraform module for managing Apache Airflow Users and Roles -> click here terraform-iam-user-group - Terraform module for managing AWS IAM Users, Roles, Policies and Groups -> click here Plausible - Python API Wrapper for Plausible API -> click here Kubus - Kubernetes security scanner prototype based on CIS benchmark -> click here 2022:

item.title: Talks
item.description: I used to be speaker in some meetup or conferences such as: Cloud Infrastructure Engineer vs SRE. Alchemy x DKatalis online meetup - 2023 Cloud Infrastructure Automation with Python. BandungPy Offline Meetup - 2023 | Page Django Application Monitoring and Logging with Sentry, ELK (Elasticsearch, Logstash & Kibana) and Prometheus (Online).
